posts.post_content:
Hello,

I have one Old Judge N172 card and one Mayo's Cut Plug card for sale. They're both pretty nice cards:

Pfeffer (Mayo's Cut Plug)  $90 SOLD
Tuckerman (N172)    $175  SOLD

Please PM or e-mail me at [url]pbaldes@gmail.com[/url]. I accept Paypal gift, check or money order.

Scans are below. I apologize if the scans seem slightly out of focus. Both cards have very sharp fronts. 

Thanks for looking!
Peter Baldes
square5000 on ebay
